summary:
Wraith Mode. Inspired in Talion from shadow of mordor.
<br />CHANGES THE SHOUT AURA WHISPER
descriptionHtml:
Wraith Mode. Inspired in Talion from shadow of mordor.
CHANGES THE SHOUT AURA WHISPER
This mod makes the Aura Whisper Shout, also add a ghost appearence to the Player to simulate wraith mode.
1 Word:   Dur - 30s  Cooldown - 10s
2 Words: Dur - 60s(1Min) Cooldown - 25s
3 Words: Dur - 120s(2Min) Cooldown - 35s
[b][i]YOU SHOULDN'T SPAM THIS SHOUT. THE FAST COOLDOWN IS INTENDED TO ENABLE THE USE OF OTHER SHOUTS WHILE WRAITH.
THE ONLY WAY OF GETTING OUT OF WRAITH MODE IS WAITING UNTIL THE DURATION ENDS.
YOU CAN ATTACK AND BE ATTACKED AND STAY ON WRAITH MODE.[/i][/b]



Credits to:
Bethesda for the Creation Kit
Warner Bros and Monolith Studios for Shadow of Mordor.
KillKillerBR(My Friend) for giving the idea of the mod.
author: Minoxs
